Package net.asrex.skillful.message.client

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EffectToggleHandler
    Handler class for EffectToggleMessage.
    EffectToggleMessage
    A message sent to clients when a perk should be enabled
    PerkActivateErrorHandler
    Handles PerkActivateErrorMessage objects coming from the server.
    PerkActivateErrorMessage
    Sent from the server to a client when a particular perk could not be activated.
    SkillInfoHandler
    Handles incoming SkillInfoMessage instances, updates the client-side PlayerSkillInfo, and sends a
    SkillInfoMessage
    A message sent to synchronize server-side PlayerSkillInfo instances with the client.
